author: andyc
msg: Implemented entity references appearing in attribute values.
Now the DOM tree built by the DOMParser puts entity references
into the attribute's child nodes. The entity references can
then contain additional text and entity references, recursively.

author: lehors
msg: implemented a scanLiteral method that is now used throughout
the code. It handles character refs and PE refs when requested.

author: lehors
msg: modified scanLiteral to deal with external entities that need
to be treated like if they were not in a literal.
